original_text: They have married some of the foreign people's daughters. They have let their sons do the same thing. In this way, God's holy people have become mixed with the foreign people who live near to them. Our own leaders and officers have led the way in these bad things.’
korean_text: 그들의 딸을 맞이하여 아내와 며느리로 삼아 거룩한 자손이 그 지방 사람들과 서로 섞이게 하는데 방백들과 고관들이 이 죄에 더욱 으뜸이 되었다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: They have married some of the foreign people's daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이방인의 딸들 중 일부와 결혼했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have let their sons do the same thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 아들들도 똑같은 일을 하도록 허락했습니다.

sentences.original_text: God's holy people have become mixed
with the foreign people who live near to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 근처에 사는 이방인들과 섞이게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Our own leaders and officers have led the way
